---
title: "Experiment Setup"
format: html
---
```{r}
project <-"SDY_Myeloid"
experiment <- "2025-10-01"
```

```{r}
library(HEULog)
```

```{r}
NewExperiment(project=project, retroactiveDate=experiment, DayHedge=0) 
```

```{r}
AddSpecimens(name="INF018", vials=1, project=project, experiment=experiment)
AddSpecimens(name="INF109", vials=1, project=project, experiment=experiment)
AddSpecimens(name="INF200", vials=1, project=project, experiment=experiment)
AddSpecimens(name="INF193", vials=1, project=project, experiment=experiment)
AddSpecimens(name="ND006", vials=1, project=project, experiment=experiment)
```

```{r}
HEULog:::ExperimentTemplate(extras=2, blankpages=1, experiment=experiment, project=project)
```

```{r}
print("Done")
```
